original_text: And by the river upon the bank thereof, on this side and on that side, shall grow all trees for meat, whose leaf shall not fade, neither shall the fruit thereof be consumed: it shall bring forth new fruit according to his months, because their waters they issued out of the sanctuary: and the fruit thereof shall be for meat, and the leaf thereof for medicine.
korean_text: 강 좌우 가에는 각종 먹을 과실나무가 자라서 그 잎이 시들지 아니하며 열매가 끊이지 아니하고 달마다 새 열매를 맺으리니 그 물이 성소를 통하여 나옴이라 그 열매는 먹을 만하고 그 잎사귀는 약 재료가 되리라

sentences.original_text: And by the river upon the bank thereof
on this side and on that side
shall grow all trees for meat
neither shall the fruit thereof be consumed
it shall bring forth new fruit
because their waters they issued out of the sanctuary
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그 물들이 성소에서 흘러 나왔음이니라

sentences.original_text: and the fruit thereof shall be for meat
and the leaf thereof for medicine
